welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bohemia, where the charm of small-town America meets stunning natural beauty. Enjoy our quaint streets, local shops and restaurants, and don't miss out on exploring our renowned hiking trails. We hope you have a wonderful time in our lovely city!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal for Long Island Mac Arthur Airport, where all commercial flights operate.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive amenities and services for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's complimentary WiFi network throughout the terminals.
